text: The Latest : No time for Samira Wiley to process Emmys nom Samira Wiley, presenter and nominee for outstanding guest actress in a drama series for ` ` The Handmaid's Tale,'' participates in an interview following the 70th Primetime Emmy Nominations Announcements at the Television Academy's Saban Media Center on Thursday, July 12, 2018, in Los Angeles. ( Photo by Chris Pizzello / Invision / AP ) LOS ANGELES ( AP ) â€” The Latest on the nominations for the 70th annual Emmy Awards, which are being announced Thursday by in Los Angeles ( all times local ) : 11 : 30 a. m. Samira Wiley says she had no idea she would find out she was nominated for an Emmy Award while presenting the nominations Thursday morning
